page.title: 04HOMELIFE-(b)
page.content: While her daughter is asleep Mrs.Smith prepares her husband' meal for when he returns from work.Her child has a rest for an hour and a half. By that time it is time to get her ready to collect Haley.When they arrive home they have tea, then watch the children's programmes on television.The children play out while Mrs.Smith does the washing and ironing.Next she prepares the bath for the children, gives her husband his meal,calls in the children undresses them and baths them.They put on their night dresses play for awhile and watch television.The children are put to bed about 7.30p.m.and Mrs.Smith says "Peace reigns at last"Mrs.Smith then knits while conversing with her husband and watching television.At 9.30 she prepares supper afterwards she checks if the little ones are asleep.They both retire by 11.00......
